metadata.description: Greeting dialogue templates with personality and formality variations

friendly_casual.name: WarmWelcome
friendly_casual.text: Welcome, friend! It's wonderful to see you!

friendly_casual.name: EnthusiasticHello
friendly_casual.text: Well met! What adventures bring you to these parts?

formal_polite.name: FormalGreeting
formal_polite.text: Greetings. How may I assist you?

formal_polite.name: HumbleWelcome
formal_polite.text: Oh, hello. I'm nobody important, but how can I help?

hostile_gruff.name: SuspiciousQuestion
hostile_gruff.text: Who are you? What brings you here?

hostile_gruff.name: HostileChallenge
hostile_gruff.text: State your business before I lose my patience.

weary_gloomy.name: WearyGreeting
weary_gloomy.text: Another traveler... What is it you need?

arrogant_superior.name: ArrogantAcknowledgment
arrogant_superior.text: Ah, someone seeking my expertise, no doubt.

arrogant_superior.name: SuperiorSmirk
arrogant_superior.text: Oh, what does the common rabble want now?

shy_nervous.name: NervousStammer
shy_nervous.text: Oh! Um, h-hello... Can I... help you?

mysterious_cryptic.name: MysteriousWhisper
mysterious_cryptic.text: Ah, fate brings us together... How curious.

mysterious_cryptic.name: EnigmaticSmile
mysterious_cryptic.text: The threads of destiny weave in strange patterns today.

quirky_unique.name: SingsGreeting
quirky_unique.text: Hello, hello, what brings you here-o!

quirky_unique.name: RhymingWelcome
quirky_unique.text: A traveler I see, has come to visit me!

quirky_unique.name: ThirdPersonIntro
quirky_unique.text: Grog welcomes you! Grog is happy to help!

wise_sage.name: WiseGreeting
wise_sage.text: Welcome, child. What wisdom do you seek?

wise_sage.name: PhilosophicalOpening
wise_sage.text: Ah, a seeker of knowledge arrives. Ask, and ye shall receive.

merchant_salesman.name: SalesmanPitch
merchant_salesman.text: Welcome, welcome! Looking to buy or sell today?

merchant_salesman.name: EagerSeller
merchant_salesman.text: Ah, a customer! You won't find better prices anywhere!

notes.usage: Greeting templates are selected based on NPC personality and formality level
